name: FREE_TXT_SUP_PROV_OTH_IDS
description: The other IDs of the free-text supervising provider. For instance, a state-specific ID number, such as the Texas Department of Public Safety (DPS) number.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ID_NUM
columns.description: This is the ID number for other IDs of the free-text supervising provider.

columns.name: ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the ID types for other IDs of the free-text supervising provider.

columns.name: ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.
